mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ticket_order ( member_seq, booking_date, booking_status, delete_flag, create_datetime ) VALUES ( ${memberSeq}, #{bookingDate}, #{bookingStatus}, #{deleteFlag}, #{createDateTime} );

SELECT seq, member_seq, booking_date, booking_status, delete_flag FROM ticket_order WHERE member_seq = ${memberSeq};
